Head Machine Learning Consulting Unit (MLCU)<br>
Munich Center for Machine Learning (MCML)<br/>
LMU Munich

I am the head of the [Machine Learning Consulting Unit (MLCU)](https://mcml.ai/transfer/consulting/) at the [Munich Center for Machine Learning](https://mcml.ai/) and Senior Lecturer at the [Department of Statistics](https://www.statistik.uni-muenchen.de/index.html) at LMU Munich.

My research focuses on statistical and machine learning methods for non-standard data with correlations (hierarchical, longitudinal, spatial) and complex temporal processes with sampling bias and partial observability (survival analysis).

I'm passionate about scientific consulting and knowledge transfer into domain science and industry.
